    Helper to simplify the use of numbers.

      • getZeroOrValue

        public static java.math.BigDecimal getZeroOrValue​(java.math.BigDecimal decimal)
        If the decimal is null, return 0. Otherwise, return its value.
        Parameters:
        decimal - The decimal to check.
        Returns:
        0 if the decimal is null, otherwise its value.

        Returns:

        value - La valeur initiale.
        scale - Précision.

        La valeur répartie.
